description: This is a shell script used for uploading onboard logs in a device management context. It contains functions for configuring network connection types, handling upload retries, and performing log uploads via curl, including support for cloud encryption and Codebig connections.

methods.name: get_Codebigconfig
methods.description: Configures whether Codebig is available and enabled based on system configurations.

methods.name: IsCodebigBlocked
methods.description: Checks if the Codebig connection is currently blocked based on last failure time.

methods.name: useDirectRequest
methods.description: Performs log upload directly via curl with retries.

methods.name: useCodebigRequest
methods.description: Performs log upload via Codebig with retries and signing.

methods.name: uploadOnboardLogs
methods.description: Main function to upload logs, orchestrates request methods, handles encryption and responses.
